mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE VALUES(MESSAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{send_id}, #{recieve_id}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, NULL, #{mes_content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{mes_no} NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT RECIEVE_ID, MES_NO, SEND_ID, MES_CONTENT, VIEW_DATE, SEND_DATE, R_DELYN, S_DELYN FROM ( SELECT MSG.RECIEVE_ID, MSG.MES_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY MSG.RECIEVE_ID ORDER BY MSG.MES_NO DESC) NO, MES_CONTENT, MSG.SEND_ID, MSG.VIEW_DATE, MSG.SEND_DATE, MSG.R_DELYN, MSG.S_DELYN FROM MESSAGE MSG WHERE MSG.SEND_ID = #{id} or msg.recieve_id = #{id}) MSG WHERE MSG.NO=1

SELECT MES_NO, SEND_ID, RECIEVE_ID, VIEW_YN, SEND_DATE, VIEW_DATE, MES_CONTENT, S_DELYN, R_DELYN, PARENT_MSGNO FROM MESSAGE WHERE (RECIEVE_ID IN (#{recieve_id}, #{send_id})) AND (SEND_ID IN (#{send_id}, #{recieve_id})) ORDER BY MES_NO DESC
